legacy.full_text:
I have to travel to Japan & China Open on Sat. Me and my team applied for Japan visa on 30/10/23. We still haven’t got the visa. I have to apply for a China visa as well.
Urgent request for visa for myself, my coach and physio. Please help @ianuragthakur Sir @PMOIndia @meaindia1

The Embassy got the visa applications of Mr. Lakshya Sen @lakshya_sen and his team yesterday (9th November) , and we've managed to issue the visas for them today. Welcome to China, Mr. Lakshya Sen, wish you and your team have a nice trip, achieve good results and Happy Diwali…

legacy.description: Spokesperson of Chinese Embassy in India, sharing facts
legacy.name: Wang Xiaojian

result.text:
Noted some misleading reports on China's scientific research vessel Shi Yan 6 docking at Colombo Port.
 
Shi Yan 6 conducting marine scientific research activities is consistent with international law and international customary practice. Outcomes of the research activities will promote the sustainable utilsation of the ocean. Labelling Shi Yan 6 as a “Spy Ship” is totally absurd and groundless. 

Sri Lanka is a transportation hub in the Indian Ocean. Vessels from various countries, including India and USA,  have made port calls in Sri Lanka for replenishment.  Normal scientific research activities in the Indian Ocean should not be disrupted.
